ISSUE.TITLE: OOB Email Templates Address Line 2 missing
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.1 Steps to reproduce the problem: Place an order, review emails sent to customer and store owner. Address line 2 is missing in templates. This has caused unnecessary admin/customer enquiries "can I update the address on the order please? etc." I know it can easily be edited in template, but store owners may miss this on a new store, so would be better to correct out-of-the-box.
